name: One Man Band (GADIG)
description:
You are a recluse musician who has been forced out into the dangerous world after a magical wind has blown all the music notes off your sheet music. With no combat experience, you have no choice but to use your music to confuse and turn dangerous monsters against each other as you slip by and collect your missing works.

--------------------------------------

Controls

Movement: WASD Keys
Shoot: Left Click + Aim with Mouse
Switch Instruments: Right Click, Numpad 123
Pause: ESC Key

--------------------------------------
